testsuite.name: Batch Issuance of Attestations in EUDI Wallet

testcase.name: User visits issuer service on a different device
User opens Wallet and authenticates successfully
Wallet scans QR code and receives attestation offer
Wallet requests confirmation to proceed
User visits issuer on same device
User authenticates successfully in Wallet on same device
Wallet receives offer and prompts confirmation
Attestations stored based on issuer's smaller batch size
Successful authentication in the Wallet
Unsuccessful authentication in the Wallet
Request issuance of an attestation type
Redirection issue to the issuer service
Successful authentication and consent in the Issuer service
Attestations stored based on issuer's smaller batch size
Successful issuance and storage of attestations
Error during attestation issuance
